Plot: Lady M. wades every morning through the sea in order to heal her pain. But she is not what she pretends to be: Together with her partner Pompilius she finances her luxurious life by fraud ...
Title: The Old Lady Who Walked in the Sea
Writer: Dominique Roulet (scenario and dialogue), Dominique Roulet (adaptation), Laurent Heynemann (adaptation), Frédéric Dard (novel)
Actors: Jeanne Moreau, Michel Serrault, Luc Thuillier, Géraldine Danon
